com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Class Graphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.Graphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cleanable, Initializable

    public class Graphics
extends Object
implements Initializable, Cleanable
    An object used to simplify rendering for those who do not wish to use the batcher.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny, Sri Harsha Chilakapati
